original_text: how he entered the house of God and took and ate the bread of the Presence, which is not lawful for any but the priests to eat, and also gave it to those with him?”
korean_text: 그가 하나님의 전에 들어가서 다만 제사장 외에는 먹어서는 안 되는 진설병을 먹고 함께 한 자들에게도 주지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: how he entered the house of God
and took the bread of the Presence
and ate the bread of the Presence
which is not lawful for any but the priests to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 제사장 외에는 아무도 먹는 것이 불법인데

sentences.original_text: and also gave it to those with him
sentences.korean_translation: 또한 그와 함께 있는 자들에게도 주었는지
